nodeList.nodeDescription:
Manifest Armor
Manifests an animated set of heavy armor, which attacks slowly. Gains the stats of your Body Armor, helmet, gloves, and boots. High mana cost. Lasts until it dies.

nodeList.description: Manifested Armor gains increased effect of stats from your body armor.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Manifested Armor has +[50%] increased effect of stats from your body armor per point.
